descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/a4jXEB6.jpg[/img]
[b][color=#00ffff]
[youtube]fU32LVfEmR0[/youtube]
[/color][/b][b][color=#00ffff]Thank to Ezreki review video !![/color][/b][/center]
Hello! My name is YuiH, I am from Taiwan.
So I can only speak a little English, sorry for my poor English.

*This mod is stand-alone follower, so you don't need other mods to make her face like my image.*

Show me some screenshot with her in your game, I will very very appreciate.

Fallout4 is about to come out, so I think it's time for ok to re-upload some of my old characters,
[color=#ffff00]I just do it for people who want it, so I don't care any [/color][color=#ffff00]criticize and hating comments.
[/color]
[b][color=#ffff00]Like it, download it. Don't like it? please just leave.[/color]

[b][b][color=#00ffff][size=5][Character]
[/size][/color][/b][/b][/b][size=4][b][color=#6d9eeb]Lynea[/color]
[/b][/size]Height 0.97 Weight 0  SeveNBase
[b]Location: [/b]Whiterun The Drunken Huntsman
[b]Default Outfit:[/b] Steel Armor
[b]Weapon: [/b]Steel Sword
[b]Combat style: [/b]Fighter, 1H combat warrior
[b]Perk: [/b]Deflect Arrows, Deadly Bash, Armsman, Bladesman, Dual Flurry, Agile Defender, Deft Movement

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Character design comment:[/b]
[color=#d8d8d8][size=1]When I create her, I image she is a loyalty housecarl just like Lydia, military and noble family, strong also has elegant face,
have good feel on create her face, not get so many trouble.[/size][/color]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

[color=#00ffff][size=5][b][Recommended mod][/b][/size][/color]
